description:
Experienced attorney and Chicago native Albert Salvi founded Salvi & Maher, L.L.C., in 1991, with the goal of protecting the rights of the residents of Northern Illinois who suffered injuries or losses due to other people's negligent acts. Today, thanks to our dedication to our clients and our long record of success, our law firm has grown, and we now have four office locations in the Chicago area, including one in Waukegan, from which we proudly serve the people of Lake, Cook, McHenry, Kane, Kendall and Will counties.

At Salvi & Maher, L.L.C., we believe in providing high-quality legal services to each of our clients. Our dedication to quality and client-centric approach to personal injury law have made our four attorneys, Albert Salvi, Michael Maher, Kathy Salvi and George Tamvakis, leaders in Northern Illinois' legal community.

Whether you suffered injuries in a motor vehicle accident, in an on-the-job accident or at the hands of a negligent medical professional, the attorneys at the law firm of Salvi & Maher, L.L.C., will dedicate themselves to your case as they work to pursue compensation for your injuries or loss. If you would like to know more about the work we do and how we can help you as you seek justice after an accident, you can take advantage of our law firm's offer for a free consultation.
